segments.text: I see the woman facing away from the chaos, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely unaware of the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water rushes out, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is slippery now with that growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's wet, and she might slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets reveal the cookie jar full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing precariously to get some.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool doesn't look safe at all; it's tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready to catch or share the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their sneaky teamwork is kind of adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the potential for accident makes me uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby could shatter if there's a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is peaceful, ignoring the indoor mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this scene shows how quickly things can go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
